Text:
I feel obliged to warn downloaders, not only is the bitrate of this on the low side (you'll see blocks in dark areas), but the whole video is overexposed, and the filenames are a bit off (or at least their order). For those who are looking for quality but balk at the size of that 40gb torrent, go for the ~25gb 720p one found here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/5297979/Planet.Earth.2006.720p.HDDVD.x264-ESiR

It'll look nicer than this one and isn't overexposed like this one is.
